mapper.select: SELECT no, service_no serviceNo, service_startdate serviceStartdate, service_day serviceDay, service_date serviceDate, regdate FROM schedules WHERE service_no=#{serviceNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedules (no, service_no, service_startdate, service_day, service_date, regdate) VALUES (schedules_seq.nextval, #{serviceNo}, #{serviceStartdate}, #{serviceDay}, #{serviceDate}, systimestamp)
